name: create
description:
NAME
CREATE - constructs graph using one of the three ways

SYNOPSIS
CREATE [-h]
CREATE -a|-i|-l graphname

DESCRIPTION
CREATE constructs graphs using one of the three ways: adjacency matrix, incidence matrix and adjacency lists. Input is carried out with dialog window.
Example of adjacency matrix:
Example...
Example of incidence matrix:
Example...
Example of adjacency lists:
Example...

COMMAND-LINE OPTIONS
-h, --help - option that shows this text
-a, --adjacency-matrix - 'description'
-i, --incidence-matrix - 'description'
-l, --adjacency-lists - 'description'
